order by ${orderByClause}

select Project_ID,Project_Name, sum(Real_Water_Amount) Real_Water_Amount, sum(Real_Cement_Amount) Real_Cement_Amount from t_luding_slurry_amount
group by Project_ID,Project_Name
mapper.insert: insert into t_luding_slurry_amount (Section_ID, Project_ID, Section_Name, Section_Leader, Project_Name, Expect_Water_Amount, Expect_Cement_Amount, Real_Water_Amount, Real_Cement_Amount, Real_Cement2_Amount, Real_Slurry_Amount, Water_Cement_Ratio, Density) values (#{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectWaterAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expectCementAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realWaterAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realCementAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realCement2Amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realSlurryAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{waterCementRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{density,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
